mapper.select: select p.permission_id,p.permission_name,p.path,p.type,p.parent_id,p.order_num from sys_role r left join relation_user_role ur on (r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join sys_user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) left join relation_role_permission rp on (rp.role_id = r.role_id) left join sys_permission p on (p.permission_id = rp.permission_id) where u.username = #{userName}
